code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest restRequest, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     final FollowInfoAction.Request request = new FollowInfoAction.Request().     request.setFollowerIndices(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(restRequest.param("index"))).     return channel -> client.execute(FollowInfoAction.INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
